storyInfo: Within Londinium's The Shard, the approaching Rhodes Island comes to Theresis's attention. At the same time, Amiya, Siege and the Doctor are bringing their squad in close to Londinium itself.

attributes.text: Londinium, Auchterigg Borough
Inside The Shard

attributes.content: Our project is near to its close.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I hear the sound of the storm, and so do they.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: They're telling me now, how they like this sound. They're dying to become a part of the storm, to howl wantonly through the air, to go and devour this hateful city before us.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Perfect.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: In ten days, our airship will be complete. From there, they'll be able to take to Londinium's skies, and serve as the storm's very pilots.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I'll be going with them.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: That suits our plan. You are the optimal candidate to command our air forces, given I must be defending The Shard.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: No, Theresis, that isn't what I mean.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: They and I, as one, can but only go together.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Prior to their departure, you are to continue fulfilling your duty.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The Royal Court needs you, and our soldiers need their most trustworthy monarch.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Moreover, you are more proficient in building than I am, by all rights. Our construction rate has sped up by ten percent since you began attending Court meetings.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I would not forget what I am meant to do.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Also. I noticed you deposed of those... guards. The Confessarii have given you no end of grief for that, have they?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Deposing of the guards about you was the Military Commission's decision. We need more sentries, so we can answer to the greatest period of danger.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: If needs be, I can enter the battlefield too.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Stay here. This tower... and the airship. Those lie at the core of our plans.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Once these two projects are through and done with, Kazdel will possess the power to fend off all nations.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Fend off all nations, you say...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I've always known of your ambitions, but it makes it no less unbelievable to hear every time.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Hasn't it always plagued you that they would not permit us to rise again?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Very soon, you will be plagued no longer.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: —If even the bearing of the storm is ours to control, who would still be occupied by the dark clouds floating at its head?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: In the past, we Sarkaz let our enemies pursue us.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Time and time again we stood up in the ruins, and time again we rebuilt our homeland, and time again we watched our home be torn to shreds by the wars they incited.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Sarkaz... Sarkaz. We are a rootless people.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Why is that? Solely because they have occupied our finest soil, and forbid our roots to take.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: In the war two hundred years ago, it took all our might to drive the enemy back—yet we still could not preserve Kazdel.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: After that, how much time did we have to devote, to just about reconvene our stranded remnants?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: And how much more time—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: To transport these bare shreds Victoria and Ursus could not see to a wasteland they were just as blind to, and rebuild Kazdel again right under their very noses?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Two hundred years?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Yes. It has taken us these two full centuries.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: So what of the next time? Suppose our Kazdel is once again razed by flames of war? How much more time will we need to rebuild it?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Now five hundred years—or even longer?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Our enemies have almost gotten away with this, precisely because we've become accustomed to drifting.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Ruination after ruination may never snuff out the Sarkaz soul, but it has unarguably scattered us.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Kazdel today is merely crammed with houses. It is not home.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Still more Sarkaz wander the great land beyond, no dreams in their mind's eye further than tomorrow's bread.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Even the Royal Court... All Kazdel has is its Ten Kings' Court of tradition, and the majority of those ten have left their positions vacant.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: This is why you wanted war.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: It is not my want, but the Sarkaz's need.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: This time, it will be beneath our feet where war's flames ignite. Victoria, Ursus, Leithanien... not one city, not one patch of soil will be fortunate enough to escape.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Within the next century, our enemies will no longer have the energy left to set their sights on Kazdel.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: No, more than that. Once we have the ability to guide the storm—they'll come to fear the Sarkaz's gaze instead, just as they fear the storm descending.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The storm... gathers atop this tower we stand in.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: They will see us, stood in the storm's eye. Every enemy of the Sarkaz will throw themselves at us with all they have, to stop us.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Then let them.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You... Don't you fear the inferno consuming your body too, when the first thunderbolt strikes?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: When you built Babel, you too knew all opposers would point their swords at you—and did you ever once fear?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The tower you built with life has collapsed, just like another Kazdel.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: And at this moment, we stand here—in a new tower, in a new opportunity.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Look at Londinium today. You only just presided over the meeting of the kings. How can you not have realized?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Not even before the useless war between us began, were the Sarkaz so close to unity.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.text: 「I'll return to the city's outer barracks soon,\nYour Majesty Theresa.」
「I understand, Nachzehrer King.\nOur meeting here will be as brief as possible.」
「You're always in such a hurry, Nachzehrer.\nYou don't want to get together with us?」
「I haven't the time to spare, Vampire.\nA hundred thousand are stationed outside Londinium.\nNot I nor my soldiers can spare a second of complacency.」
「Then let's switch our duty. I'm already sick of the blabbering nobles inside the city.」
「And, Theresis, your little Gaulish friend is just as foolish and noisy as them.」
「I've got to warn you in advance. My patience is limited.」
「His head will have to stay on his neck for a moment longer. Don't add the city's Victorian Army to our troubles.」
「Fine enough. That said,\ndon't you feel that some still haven't been put to use?」
「Do you speak of myself, Vampire?\nI have great affairs upcoming, don't I, Your Highnesses?」
「Of course. Control of Londinium is inseparable from the efforts of us all.」
「Has there been word from the Messenger you sent, Confessarius?」
「By Manfred's tireless urging, the Lich is now fast on the way to Londinium.」
「The few Wendigos left remain battling strange monsters in Ursus's north. Their hearts hold the Royal Court no more.」

「The Cyclops sends a letter. As ever, she describes a tragic scene—Londinium sundered by great fire into thirds, The Shard fallen under lightning strikes in their hundreds, and the Regent... yes, she still prophesies your end, Regent.」
「Speak.」
「She says she has seen your solitary death, on the underground throne of the Palace of Westhaleg.」
「Give her a reply, thanking her for her concern.」
「Continue searching for any sign of the Gargoyles. So long as you can find any remnant blood vessels, immediately send an invitation.」
「The Council will, together with the Royal Court, ensure victory in this war.」

attributes.content: If the Sarkaz can still be given a new chance, then that chance lies before our eyes, and it is one and only.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: And very, very many will die.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: So many... Victorians, and so many Sarkaz. The people's blood will change this grey city through and through, and their wails will cover even the thunder.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: This is a war. A war between us and them, one continued for centuries, without end.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Yes, war... This has always been how we Sarkaz continue to survive.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: If you have any objections, speak.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Single out the dangers of my plan, just as you have countless times before.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I have no objections.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: None... you say?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: If you could hear these sounds in my head, you would know, they would not allow me another choice.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Provided this war can truly free Kazdel from the cycle of destruction... Provided this storm can truly put out the Sarkaz's smoldering enmity, and return countless souls to the freedom of rest...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I will stand with you, ensuring our dream can be made reality.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: A fine turn.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: There is one more thing—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The Rhodes Islanders are already on their way.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: 6:50 A.M. \ Overcast
527km out from Londinium, operation platform of an abandoned mine
Dr. Kal'tsit, anchoring sequence will begin in T plus one hour, forty-eight minutes.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Good. Ensure the boarding region can operate normally before then.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Understood. We'll step up the cleanup.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Warfarin, have all critically ill patients been appropriately situated?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Relax, it's just the last three left, and we're operating on them tomorrow. We'll have the moving sickbeds arranged in no time...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Don't rush me, okay? You standing here with your stern look makes our Medic Operators have to keep peeking at you.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: This is an emergency.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Fine, I get it, I'll quit joking.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Every day's been like a battle ever since we entered Victoria. If you hadn't transferred so many operators away beforehand...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Rhodes Island must operate as usual.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We reached this consensus at the first resolutive meeting, Warfarin.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No complaints from me. You made Mon3tr lash me to the side of the ship four years ago...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I mean, when you invited me to join Rhodes Island. We agreed I would research Oripathy alongside you, as a doctor.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: There wasn't any 'follow the new King of Sarkaz in a fight to win back Kazdel'-type clause in my contract, and switching Kazdel out for Londinium changes nothing.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: This goes for a great deal of our operators. I have no intent of forcing any one operator to participate in a mission irrelevant to their long-term goals.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Moreover, no matter the other operations we are forced to take on, we cannot turn a blind eye to the Infected throughout every region.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: *Sigh* If it wasn't for our work there, we'd have a few more elite operators to spare for this Londinium trip.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I wonder how Amiya's crew are doing.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Once we reach the vicinity of Londinium, we'll receive word.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Recon group, report situation on both sides!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Received. No threat, copy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Closure, we can pass through ahead! Keep the engineering team with us!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Dr.{@nickname}, still got it in you to move? Want my drones to give you a lift?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: I'm fine, let's keep going.;......;When were drones capable of that?

attributes.content: Lemme think... huh, I can't actually think of anything wrong with the idea.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Doctor, we just need to walk a little longer. When we're out of this danger zone, then we can ride on our crafts and recuperate a little.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We'll need to send Dr. Kal'tsit a message at some point, too... She must be extremely worried about us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Wonder if it's going smoothly on the landship's side.;She should be sending us a message too.

attributes.content: That's exactly why she had to stay behind... she can only rendezvous with us once Rhodes Island is safely situated. That's our joint responsibility.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: For safety, we can't use any messaging devices on our approach to Londinium.
attributes.name: Amiya
Amiya
attributes.content: Any signal might be intercepted by the Duke's force.

attributes.name: Amiya
attributes.content: No, it might get even worse... Doctor, we can't afford to have Theresis spot us so quickly.
attributes.joined: Any signal might be intercepted by the Duke's force.   No, it might get even worse... Doctor, we can't afford to have Theresis spot us so quickly.

attributes.content: Doctor, just leave this to me.
attributes.name: Amiya
Amiya
attributes.content: Ever since we planned to drive into Victoria, Doctor Kal'tsit and you have been busy securing the safety of our route.

attributes.name: Amiya
attributes.content: I will take charge for the rest of it, just like we've agreed on.
attributes.joined: Ever since we planned to drive into Victoria, Doctor Kal'tsit and you have been busy securing the safety of our route.I will take charge for the rest of it, just like we've agreed on.

attributes.content: I want a chance for you to catch your breath too... even if it's just mentally.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, we have to keep going.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ugh, there are times I think about how we got in over the past months, and it seems too smooth to even believe.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: That ragtag bunch of windbags are all together in Londinium right now, and they haven't even noticed us... Kal'tsit, did you use some kind of ancient technique I'm not aware of?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: If any Arts truly could render Rhodes Island invisible, believe me, I would've used them over a decade ago.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Haha, I almost forgot. 'Disused industrial mining equipment recovery organization'... is that right?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: We've been using that title for passage and permission to park the whole way. Trust Dr.{@nickname} to come up with that.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Dr.{@nickname} tends to have a... unique angle of thought on certain aspects.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And luckily, Closure's personal interests has had her lead the Engineering Department over the past years to develop technologies for using scrap.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Which, in short, renders the title a fine one. With the addition of a few friends' aid, this plan has been successful in execution thus far.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As for what comes next... that lies with Amiya and Vina.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Two left, four right. Indra?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Check.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: How's the right side?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Tsk. Someone who thought he was funny had me caught up for a second, but he's over with now.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: And Dagda?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I heard steel claws and crossbow bolts mashing into each other.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Enemies left to the rear?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Leave 'em to her.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hey, there's one hiding right here—!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Now there isn't.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Just missing Dagda...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina, listen, it's dead silence behind. I said she could sort it out.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Good. Vanguard group, mission complete.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Notify Amiya immediately: there's no more noble's patrols in the vicinity. They can pass through.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The road ahead is clear. No casualties.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Messaging devices back in operation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor... we're just about to catch sight of Londinium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: We finally made it here.;......;Now can I catch my breath too?

attributes.content: Hold on, Doctor... Jessica sent a message.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah... before we carry out the next step of the plan, we need to send a few operators to run a different mission.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have two targets to rescue. One's a friend at Blacksteel, and the other is an informant who can help us enter Londinium.
attributes.name: Amiya
